statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 3 \\ 1 \\ -2 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -4 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 10 \\ -2 \\ 0 \\ -6 \\ 10 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 16 \\ 4 \\ 2 \\ -10 \\ 14 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 41 \\ 17 \\ 7 \\ -26 \\ 34 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ 20 \\ 5 \\ 5 \\ -15 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
